Veratis was suddenly overwhelmed by a wave of emotion, he again 
grabbed his head in pain. "You must calm down or you'll overload us 
both. He regained his composure, "You should feal priveliged, you are 
a new life form. The virus caused a mutation in your DNA. By 
programming your sequencer to reject the polar bear DNA so your 
protoform mutated it into something else. The virus then stabilized 
the mutation." She could read his thoughts, he knew he didn't have to 
explain but he fealt he owed it to her.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Shadow Wing::
> 
> She looked at Veratis with shock. "You?  And..it..I won't 
transform?" 
> She jumped and tried to transform.  She stood up on her hind legs, 
> the head on the bear moves and the metal face of a female bot was 
> exposed as the jaw of the bear moved down.  Her left wing suddenly 
> dropped to the floor with a loud clang. She looked at Veratis. 
Fear, 
> curousity, anger, all flooded her thoughts.  She unknowingly 
> projected them to Veratis. She looked at him as her new eyes 
focused 
> on him. "What...am...I?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "Your body rejected the transfer." Veratis said looking up at the 
> > large bear. "You'll probably lose those wings in time" he didn't 
> want 
> > to tell her but knew it was best to be honest with a bot with 
> > telepathic abilities. "I had to use the virus to stop the 
> rejection. 
> > You might lose your ability to transform completely." he kept his 
> > distance, he didn't know how she'd react to the bad news.
> >
